entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.6°C

Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
